# TimeoutTimer.RemainingTimeSpan property

Gets the time left.

```csharp
public TimeSpan RemainingTimeSpan { get; }
```

## Property Value

The time left.

## Remarks

Returns int.MaxValue milliseconds for a timer that never times out.
